医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
通过对 AlphaFold2 模型的对抗性攻击生成突变蛋白质宣布在《药物学报》杂志上发表新文章。蛋白质是重要的大分子，根据其构象动力学发挥功能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241221/Generate-mutated- Proteins-through-adversarial-attacks-on-the-AlphaFold2-model.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241221/Generate-mutated- Proteins-through-adversarial-attacks-on-the-AlphaFold2-model.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4526f8ec-714c-4c10-92df-fdfd41df4167 Sat, 21 Dec 2024 23:04:12 -0500 Generating mutated proteins through adversarial attacks on the AlphaFold2 model
通过关系社区参与推进优质综合卫生服务与卡塔尔教育、科学和社区发展基金会 (QF) 合作编写了一份题为“社区参与的相关性：其在人性化医疗保健和实现优质综合卫生服务中的作用”的新报告，并在第七届世界卫生大会上发布。世界健康创新峰会 (WISH) 将于 2024 年 11 月 13 日至 14 日在多哈举行。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241221/Advancing-quality-integrated-health-services-through-relational-community-engagement.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241221/Advancing-quality-integrated-health-services-through-relational-community-engagement.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=de740fbe-c057-4240-9238-e27ecc7d74b5 Sat, 21 Dec 2024 22:55:23 -0500 Advancing quality integrated health services through relational community engagement
新的类皮肤材料可能会彻底改变感染测试据报道，在假日电影《圣诞怪杰》中，化妆师每天花费几个小时用假肢包裹金凯瑞的脸，打造出标志性的脾气暴躁、绿毛生物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241220/New-skin-like-material-could-revolutionize-infection-testing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241220/New-skin-like-material-could-revolutionize-infection-testing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d93b95e9-389b-4c9f-b0b1-573df7b0c933 Fri, 20 Dec 2024 22:37:00 -0500 New skin-like material could revolutionize infection testing
新的研究项目旨在揭示疟疾最致命菌株背后的分子因素世界上近一半的人口生活在疟疾流行地区，恶性疟原虫造成的全球疟疾相关死亡人数约占 95%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241220/New-research-project-aims-to-uncover-molecular-factors-behind-malariae28099s-deadliest-strain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241220/New-research-project-aims-to-uncover-molecular-factors-behind-malariae28099s-deadliest-strain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6f8e67dd-b7da-4afd-bf74-dac9e780c49a Fri, 20 Dec 2024 22:28:00 -0500 New research project aims to uncover molecular factors behind malaria’s deadliest strain
解决利什曼病药物开发中长达数十年的难题在了解单细胞寄生虫如何产生麦角甾醇（胆固醇的一种形式）方面取得突破，可能会带来治疗人类利什曼病的更有效药物。利什曼病是一种寄生虫病，每年困扰全球约 100 万人，并导致约 3 万人死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241220/Solving-a-decades-long-puzzle-in-leishmaniasis-drug-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241220/Solving-a-decades-long-puzzle-in-leishmaniasis-drug-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cd6645ab-e81e-4fae-9d2c-39338d758f71 Fri, 20 Dec 2024 22:20:00 -0500 Solving a decades-long puzzle in leishmaniasis drug development
评估戈泽托肽对 PSMA 阳性前列腺癌的影响Gozetotide 是一种用于诊断成人前列腺癌的药物。它是目前唯一识别 PSMA 阳性前列腺癌的诊断剂，因此可以识别可以选择使用 (177Lu) 镥 vipivotide tetraxetan（简称“Lutetium-177”）进行 PSMA 靶向治疗的患者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241220/Assessing-the-impact-of-gozetotide-in-PSMA-positive-prostate-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241220/Assessing-the-impact-of-gozetotide-in-PSMA-positive-prostate-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=05dc8f7e-d970-425c-af85-197d0c4cafef Fri, 20 Dec 2024 22:12:00 -0500 Assessing the impact of gozetotide in PSMA-positive prostate cancer
睫毛作为天然液体偏导器，实现清晰视野在人类的进化过程中，身体和面部毛发明显减少，但睫毛仍然是一个显着特征。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241220/Eyelashes-as-natural-liquid-deflectors-for-clear-vision.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241220/Eyelashes-as-natural-liquid-deflectors-for-clear-vision.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=37dd66ab-d0b9-4766-b5ae-79ab6fbed414 Fri, 20 Dec 2024 22:04:00 -0500 Eyelashes as natural liquid deflectors for clear vision
科学家发现肿瘤硬度在促进癌细胞增殖中的作用据世界卫生组织称，仅 2022 年就有超过 2000 万人被诊断出患有癌症，近 1000 万人死于该病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241220/Scientists-discover-role-of-tumor-stiffness-in-promoting-cancer-cell-proliferation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241220/Scientists-discover-role-of-tumor-stiffness-in-promoting-cancer-cell-proliferation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=44526ba7-fd46-4542-8650-4b616397a314 Fri, 20 Dec 2024 21:54:35 -0500 Scientists discover role of tumor stiffness in promoting cancer cell proliferation
加州大学戴维斯分校的外科医生率先为 13 岁患者使用双腔无引线起搏器加州大学戴维斯分校儿科电生理学主任 Dan Cortez 创造了另一项世界纪录：他是第一个在儿童体内植入双腔无引线起搏器的人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241220/UC-Davis-surgeon-pioneers-dual-chamber-leadless-pacemaker-in-13-year-old-patent.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241220/UC-Davis-surgeon-pioneers-dual-chamber-leadless-pacemaker-in-13-year-old-patent.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=859bcdc2-2c4e-4ac1-8525-96f783c69286 Fri, 20 Dec 2024 21:48:07 -0500 UC Davis surgeon pioneers dual chamber leadless pacemaker in 13-year-old patient
研究发现一部分人造心脏患者可以再生心肌由亚利桑那大学医学院 - 图森萨弗心脏中心的一位医师科学家共同领导的一个研究小组发现，一部分人造心脏患者可以再生心肌，这可能为新的治疗方法打开大门，也许有一天治愈心力衰竭。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241220/Study-finds-a-subset-of-artificial-heart-病人-can-regenerate-heart-muscle.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241220/Study-finds-a-subset-of-artificial-heart-病人-can-regenerate-heart-muscle.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9cc7a5fa-1208-4d60-8d47-3eddd81b2c74 Fri, 20 Dec 2024 21:43:36 -0500 Study finds a subset of artificial heart patients can regenerate heart muscle
